Course Name: Ruby on Rails: Learn 25+ gems and build a Startup MVP 2023
Comment: The course was outdated; most of the things didn’t work as expected. I had to make a lot of changes to get the project running. Additionally, the teacher didn’t explain what he was doing in some chapters and assumed that the students already knew how to proceed. I had to rely on external resources and search elsewhere because the information provided wasn’t very helpful. However, some of the tools were useful and contained many gems that I didn’t know about.

Course Name: Ruby on Rails: Learn 25+ gems and build a Startup MVP 2023
Comment: The installation steps need to be updated, it made me tired (especially bootstrap) Other than that, it was a nice and successful course.

Course Name: Ruby on Rails: Learn 25+ gems and build a Startup MVP 2023
Comment: This is what I expected for the course, it has some lessons that need to be updated but overall it is a good course to learn and practice the Rails framework, needs some updates for some gem, and the gem chartkick has some conflict with the rich text area (action_text), both can't work together for rails 7.

Course Name: Ruby on Rails: Learn 25+ gems and build a Startup MVP 2023
Comment: All good, lot of new informations.... thank you!

Course Name: Ruby on Rails 6: Startup MVP: School Attendance Tracking App
